# Integration Service MyPy Configuration
# Purpose: Type checking for integration service (16 'Any' occurrences to fix)
# Status: Phase 2 - Higher strictness for public APIs
# Last Updated: 2026-01-03

[mypy]
# Python version target
python_version = 3.11

# Import handling
ignore_missing_imports = True
follow_imports = normal
namespace_packages = True

# Incremental checking
incremental = True
cache_dir = .mypy_cache

# Output configuration
show_error_codes = True
show_column_numbers = True
show_error_context = True
pretty = True
color_output = True

# Warning level - more aggressive warnings for this service
warn_return_any = True
warn_unused_configs = True
warn_redundant_casts = True
warn_unused_ignores = True
warn_no_return = True
warn_unreachable = True

# Strictness settings - Higher than root due to smaller surface area
strict_optional = True
check_untyped_defs = True
no_implicit_optional = True
strict_equality = True

# Start with warnings, enable these after Phase 2 completion
disallow_untyped_defs = False
disallow_any_generics = False
disallow_incomplete_defs = False

# Files to check
files = src/

# Exclude patterns
exclude = (?x)(
    ^venv/
    | ^\.venv/
    | ^build/
    | ^dist/
    | ^\.mypy_cache/
    | /tests/
    | conftest\.py$
  )

# Pydantic plugin for model validation
plugins = pydantic.mypy

# Phase 2 Target Modules (to be enabled after type improvements)
# [mypy-src.integrations.base]
# disallow_untyped_defs = True
# disallow_incomplete_defs = True

# [mypy-src.webhooks.models]
# disallow_untyped_defs = True
# disallow_incomplete_defs = True

# [mypy-src.integrations.ticket_mapping]
# disallow_untyped_defs = True

# Third-party integrations
[mypy-fastapi.*]
ignore_missing_imports = True

[mypy-confluent_kafka.*]
ignore_missing_imports = True

[mypy-redis.*]
ignore_missing_imports = True

[mypy-httpx.*]
ignore_missing_imports = True

[mypy-jinja2.*]
ignore_missing_imports = True

task_intent.title: 056-reduce-excessive-any-type-usage-in-python-codebase
task_intent.description: Found 373 occurrences of ': Any' type annotations across 120+ Python files, with high concentrations in integration-service (16 occurrences), src/core/breakthrough (79 occurrences), and src/core/enhanced_agent_bus (50+ occurrences). Excessive use of 'Any' defeats the purpose of type hints and can mask type-related bugs.
